__e: Have you heard from Angel? When he got so mad about you being in danger, and changed into a... grrr... it was the most amazing thing I ever saw.
And the more I thought about it, you are, without question, the most remarkable man I've ever known.
I never realized how extraordinary... a nice girl could be.
And I owe nearly all of it to this extraordinary company of young artists, so I thank them all, and you.
Many years ago that man over there gave me the most extraordinary night of my life.
Last night was to be the most extraordinary night of his entire life.
Each of you are so remarkable, and I can imagine my life with most of you.
But it's time to let go, because... I met an extraordinary woman and she needs my help.
There are people who have extraordinary lives and then there's the rest of us.
I think it's a remarkable offer for somebody as closed off as I plainly am.
Well, she must be an extraordinary woman to be able to work at that age.
She would have to be so extraordinary in order to keep up.
